text: Flat Creek is an unincorporated community in Buncombe County, North Carolina. Located along Old Mars Hill Highway (SR 2207), near the Future I-26/US 19/US 23 interchange (exit 15). The community is named after Flat Creek, a tributary of the French Broad River. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Buncombe County, North Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in North Carolina
title: Flat Creek, North Carolina
